# Arithmetics
```{r}
2+2
sqrt(16)
```
### Variables
```{r}
x<-10
y<-20
x+y
```
### Vectors
```{r}
prices <-c(50,27,73,45,67)
sum(prices)
```
### Dataframe
```{r}
students <-data.frame(names=c('Alic','Bob','Carol'),scores=c(88,92,75))
mean(students$scores)
```
### A Plot
```{r}
plot(students$scores,main='Student Scores',ylab='score',xlab='Student')
```
### Matrix
```{r}
matrix=matrix(1:9,ncol=3,byrow=TRUE,dimnames = list(c('x1','x2','x3'),c('y1','y2','y3')))
matrix
```
